name: Nightscape (Jamiebanwen, AmazingAngo, darkzy27)
description:
Nightscape

In Nightscape, you are a villain who wants to take all the light and hope and instill darkness and fear. You will come across interesting gameplay and new characters. Hope you enjoy it! 

Controls

Move : Arrow Keys / A,D

Jump : Space

Dash : Z

Shoot : x

Pause : P

Portal : E

Mechanisms : Player have o collect all the dark tokens so that the portal can open and player can proceed to next level.

Light Tokens/Yellow Tokens : Collecting those will give you a shooting blade which you can shoot by pressing X to kill enemies.

Thanks! - the team behind Nightscape
